document.heading: Tenant Assistance Program Low-Yield Cooperative Association Amendment Temporary Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-128, the “Tenant Assistance Program Low-Yield Cooperative Association Amendment Temporary Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-438. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 22, 1988, and April 19, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 6, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-177 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
